title: What are some factors that influence economic activity? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1.Purchasing power of people which will creade demand. 2. Money supply in the market and its growth 3. Rate of interest on credit, high interest rate will negatively affect the demand for loan 4. Low level of govt intervention enhances economic activity. 5. Less number of permissions is favourable 6. Free flow of capital, labour and technology is helpful.
